problem_text_cn: 如图,已知AB是⊙O的直径,AC是弦,CD切⊙O于点C,交AB的延长线于点D,∠ACD=120°,BD=10cm,则⊙O的半径为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, given that AB is the diameter of ⊙O, AC is the chord, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point C, and intersects the extended line of AB at point D, ∠ACD = N_0, BD = N_1, then the radius of ⊙O is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OC,∵CD切⊙O于点C,∴∠OCD=90°,∵∠ACD=120°,∴∠ACO=30°,∵OA=OC,∴∠A=∠ACO=30°,∴∠OCD=∠A+∠ACO=60°,∴∠D=30°,∴OD=2OC,∵BD=10cm,∴OC=OB=10cm,即⊙O的半径为10cm,故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,含30°角的直角三角形性质的应用,能求出OD=2OC是解此题的关键,注意:圆的切线垂直于过切点的半径．
